# Svirfneblin Equipment
## Overview
***[[Svirfneblin]] have access to the following equipment.***

The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Svirfneblin|svirfneblin]] equipment introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
## Governed Content
- [[Homing Gem]]
- [[Magic Detector]]
- [[Miner's Tools]]
- [[Ration Pills]]
- [[Svirf Slug Mutator]]
- [[Svirfneblin Blindness Bomb]]
- [[Svirfneblin Multicrossbow]]
